newsitem.title: FINLAND: FISKARS BUYS TWO U.S. FIRMS FOR $75 MLN.
newsitem.headline: FISKARS BUYS TWO U.S. FIRMS FOR $75 MLN.

text.p: Finnish consumer products maker Fiskars Oy Ab said in a statement on Wednesday it had acquired American based Alterra Holdings Corporation, which comprises of two consumer products companies, for about $75 million.
"Aquapore Moisture Systems specialises in garden watering systems and Royal Floor Mats produces outdoor mats," it said.
Fiskars said the deal was a natural step in strategy to focus on consumer products. The aggregate annual net sales of the acquired companies exceed $70 million, it said.
"Aquapore's irrigation products complement our garden product offerings whereas Royal Floor Mats will support our expansion in the housewares field," Fiskars quoted CEO Stig Stendahl as saying.
